nodes.text: A Czerka Corporation mining team was operated on a sandcrawler on Tatooine and was lead by a captain. Tusken Raiders attacked the sandcrawler, immobilizing it and sending multiple waves of Tuskens to finish them off. However Revan intervened and defended the mining team. They left the sandcrawler in the desert for the Jawas to scavenge so they could buy it back from them.
